sentences.english: Objective To introduce the clinical application of bovine cortex bone nails in hand fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的介紹牛皮質骨骨針在手部骨折治療中的應用。

sentences.english: The early humans used bone needles and sinew to sew clothes of skin and fur.
sentences.chinese: 古時的人用骨針和動物筋縫製毛皮衣裳。

sentences.english: We found some fine needles in the cave.
sentences.chinese: 我們在洞穴裏找到了一些很細的骨針。
